mapper.insert: insert into sa_board(board_title, board_price, client_num, section_num) values (#{boardTitle}, #{boardPrice}, #{clientNum.clientNum}, #{sectionNum.sectionNum})
mapper.update: update sa_board set board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_price = #{boardPrice}, board_update = #{boardUpdate} where board_num = #{boardNum}
update sa_board set board_count = board_count + 1 where board_num = #{boardNum}
update sa_board set board_total_count = board_total_count + 1 where board_num = #{boardNum}
mapper.select: select * from sa_board, client where sa_board.client_num = client.client_num and board_num = #{num}
select * from sa_board, client where sa_board.client_num = client.client_num and section_num = #{num} order by board_date desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
select count(board_num) from sa_board where section_num = #{num}
select * from sa_board, client where sa_board.client_num = client.client_num and client.client_num = #{num} order by board_date desc
